system-onboarding.welcome-message: System Onboarding allows employees to add, update and view App ID and Name easily.
system-onboarding.setting_title: You can select which column you wish to show or hide in the table and you can also sort each column order by dragging it.
system-onboarding.Why_do_you_want_to_Delete_this_user?: Why do you want to Delete this user?

system-onboarding.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your Source System?
system-onboarding.delete_message: The Source System with the ID { {{id}} } will be deleted permanently from the Source System List.
system-onboarding.search: Search by Source System ID or Name
